\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
% \usetikzlibrary{positioning} % for relative note placement (right = of)

\input{act-comparaDivideHasta100-tarjetas-estilo.tex}


\def\textoTarjetaK{$42\div 7$}
\def\textoTarjetaL{$56\div 8$}
\def\textoTarjetaM{$72\div 9$}
\def\textoTarjetaN{$64\div 8$}
\def\textoTarjetaO{$81\div 9$}
\def\textoTarjetaP{$72\div 3$}
\def\textoTarjetaQ{$92\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaR{$69\div 3$}
\def\textoTarjetaS{$84\div 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaT{$63\div 3$}


\begin{tikzpicture}
\node[tarjeta] (tarjetaK) {\textoTarjetaK};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaK] (tarjetaL) {\textoTarjetaL};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaK] (tarjetaM) {\textoTarjetaM};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaM] (tarjetaN) {\textoTarjetaN};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaM] (tarjetaO) {\textoTarjetaO};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaO] (tarjetaP) {\textoTarjetaP};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaO] (tarjetaQ) {\textoTarjetaQ};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaQ] (tarjetaR) {\textoTarjetaR};

\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaQ] (tarjetaS) {\textoTarjetaS};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaS] (tarjetaT) {\textoTarjetaT};

\foreach \tarj in {K,...,T}{
  \node[below right, font=\scriptsize, align=left] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west){Compara: Divide hasta 100};
  % \node[below right] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west) {\tarj};
}
\end{tikzpicture}
